title: Cinnamon and Raisin Cake Bars
ingredients: ['950ml water', '300g raisins', '200g butter or cooking margarine', '500g plain flour', '400g caster sugar', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon ground cloves', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground allspice', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 eggs', '100g walnuts, chopped (optional)']
